name: commafeed
description: CommaFeed is a self-hosted RSS feed reader and Google Reader replacement. It provides categories, filtering, sharing, and a sleek UI with mobile support. Designed for users who want to keep control of their news feeds.
features: Google Reader Replacement: Familiar interface for former Google Reader users. Smooth transition guaranteed.
Category Organization: Group feeds into custom categories for easy navigation. Stay organized effortlessly.
Advanced Filtering: Create rules to highlight or hide specific content. See only what matters.
Mobile Support: Responsive design works perfectly on phones and tablets. Read anywhere, anytime.
Sharing Features: Share interesting articles with friends and colleagues. Built-in social features.
Self-Hosted: Own your news feed data and reading history. Complete privacy control.
